channel.title: Rescouses + Web host list + Ftp
channel.description:
Resource listings: http://www.alvit.de/handbook/ Revamp of ExpressionEngine/CodeIgniter sites
Validation: http://validator.w3.org/ http://www.totalvalidator.com/validator/Validator http://www.htmlvalidator.com/ http://www.silktide.com/ http://jigsaw.w3.org/css-validator/ http://www.contentquality.com/ (508 - accessibility) http://www.silktide.com/tools/sitescore Website scoring
CSS: http://www.csszengarden.com/ http://cssvault.com/resources.php http://css.maxdesign.com.au/index.htm http://cssplay.co.uk/menu/index.html
Colors: http://www.colourlovers.com/ http://www.colorsontheweb.com/ http://wellstyled.com/tools/colorscheme2/index-en.html
Tools: General Info: http://www.w3schools.com Firefox Extension: http://chrispederick.com/work/webdeveloper/ Stock Photo site: http://www.sxc.hu Opera Developer Menu: http://www.diplo.co.uk/design/operatools.php Optimisation: http://www.websiteoptimization.com/ Zip Codes: http://www.cfdynamics.com/zipbase/ World Cities: http://www.maxmind.com/app/geolitecity Fonts: http://www.dafont.com/ Various Tools: http://digitarald.de/playground/
AJAX: http://www.ajaxfreaks.com/ http://blog.joshuaeichorn.com/ajax-resources/ http://www.webpasties.com/xmlHttpRequest/ http://www.phpbuilder.com/columns/kassemi20050606.php3 (Part 1) http://www.phpbuilder.com/columns/kassemi20050613.php3 (Part 2) http://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/AJAX http://dhtmlnirvana.com/ajax/ajax_tutorial/ http://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/AJAX:Getting_Started http://www.sitepoint.com/article/remote-scripting-ajax http://ajaxpatterns.org/Ajax_Examples http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AJAX http://www.developerfusion.co.uk/show/4704/ http://java.sun.com/developer/technicalArticles/J2EE/AJAX/
Here is a list of web hosts that offer PHP and MySQL. It is no where near a full list, but it is most popular. I'm locking this so you can't reply. I am pulling this list from the most popular google searches and reviews on a forum who has a board dedicated to reviewing web hosts.
http://www.serverpowered.com http://www.webhostfreaks.com http://www.ace-host.net http://www.godaddy.com http://www.web.com http://www.hostway.com/ http://www.1and1.com/ http://www.icdsoft.com/ http://www.site5.com/ http://www.surpasshosting.com http://www.webfusion.co.uk http://emaxhosting.com http://www.100webspace.com/
[u][i][b]Ftps[/b][/i][/u] FileZilla http://filezilla.sourceforge.net/ SmartFTP http://smartftp.com/ CuteFTP http://www.cuteftp.com/ RightFTP http://www.right-soft.com/rightftp/ CoreFTP http://www.coreftp.com/ JFtp http://j-ftp.sourceforge.net/ FireFTP http://fireftp.mozdev.org/ I found this so i thought i might as well post it :)

GoDaddy

Domainnamen | Weltweit größter Domainnamen-Registrar – GoDaddy DE

GoDaddy bietet Hosting, Registrierung von Domainnamen, Webseiten, und mehr – zu erschwinglichen Preisen. Finde heraus, warum sich so viele Unternehmer dafür entscheiden, ihre Domain mit GoDaddy zu registrieren.


web.com

Website Design and Online Marketing for Small Business

Let the experts at Web.com help you grow your Small Business. We make online marketing easy!


Hostway

Hostway|HOSTING has been the leader in delivering managed multi-cloud solutions across reliable, secure, and scalable infrastructure.


http://www.1and1.com/

100webspace.com

Budget web hosting services and domain names from 100WebSpace

100WebSpace provides a variety of web hosting services and domain names at an affordable price. A free Web Apps Installer of blogs, CMSs, image galleries, etc. 24/7 tech support with 1 hour response time.
